composer archive create -t dir -n . && mv magma@0.0.1.bna dist && cd dist

composer network install --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --archiveFile magma@0.0.1.bna

composer network start --networkName magma --networkVersion 0.0.1 --networkAdmin admin --networkAdminEnrollSecret adminpw --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --file magma.card

composer card import --file magma.card

composer network ping --card admin@magma

composer-rest-server --card admin@magma
